messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] BestHomeschooling.org - Notes on Dyslexia by Kare...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/17/2003 8:58:04 AM Mountain Standard Time, wifetovegman2002@yahoo.com writes: -=-It might help school-at-homers-=- DOH! Right.  Who cares
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/17/2003 8:58:04 AM Mountain Standard Time,
wifetovegman2002@... writes:

-=-It might help school-at-homers-=-

DOH!


Right. Who cares if they're cross-dominant or left or right or ambi? You're
right.

Their learning is theirs, and THEY will figure out which hand works best for
what, and how they're going to figure out how to read and write from left to
right.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
